contents.Text: Yt-dlp args
Cache
Dependencies
Irreversible actions
This is where the download arguments are stored refer to the [[[button:Yt-dlp page][../../../Downloader/Playlist Editor/YT_dlp_args]]] for more info on args
In the above image
[[[strong:•Soft Purple:]]] Button/Heading to select what arguments you want to edit (left click to edit | right click to deselect)
[[[strong:•Soft Yellow:]]] Edit the arguments of the selected each line is a new argument sequentially (save to finalize; close to cancel; Remove to remove the entire argument entry)
[[[strong:•Dark Blue:]]] Other Buttons/Headings to select what you want to edit like soft purple
[[[strong:•Add new argument:]]] This shares the same memory as the edit arguments do this enables quick duplication of previous arguments just click on a argument you want to duplicate
then click the add button this will open the ui you see in the image then edit the comment and args then click save to finalize
after than hit close of the Button/Heading and that should return the Button/Heading to the original state thus duplicating it
This involves actions to the downloader cache
[[[strong:•Manually Regenerate Search Cache:]]] This triggers a regeneration of the search cache but does not clear it
This is useful if you added new files and want to add them to the search cache
[[[strong:•Graveyard Cache:]]] This is where dead/broken links are stored to never be used again
[[[strong:•Graveyard Temp:]]] This holds links that have failed but not failed enough to qualify to be merged into "Graveyard Cache"
Both buttons clear their respective caches forcing re-downloads of failed or potentially failed urls
Warning: You probably don't want to do this unless you tried to download offline
as downloading offline would make all downloads fail this false positives are added in here

TextCustom.content: if you do clear "Graveyard Cache" expect a large amount of urls attempting to be downloaded

contents.Text: [[[strong:•Clear Regenerate Search Cache:]]] This Clears the search cache that is used in the new search implementation
This forces all searches to be re-generated
[[[strong:•Clear Download Cache:]]] This Clears all previously downloaded URLs, effectively resetting the downloader
This forces all successful URLs to be downloaded again. Use only if a complete reset is necessary
[[[strong:•Force Yt-dlp Update:]]] This forces Yt-dlp to update immediately
This is done once a week automatically but if a emergency update is pushed to Yt-dlp
You can use this to get updated right away

TextCustom.content: [[[strong:Tip:]]] If a download fails press this to update and try again it may fix the issue

contents.Text: [[[strong:•Delete Wiki:]]] This Deletes the wiki folder and all its contents (Useful if you dont want the wiki installed anymore)
This as actions for mass deletion (Warning: These actions are final and cannot be reversed)
[[[strong:Prune History for Dead Searches:]]] This will search each thing in "History" and if the search is empty remove it from history
[[[strong:Clear History:]]] This will full remove everything from history
